mapper.sql: empid, empname, idcard, sex, email, loc, phone, hiredate, sal, leavedate, jobId, state
mapper.select: select empid, empname, idcard, sex, email, loc, phone, hiredate, sal, leavedate, e.jobId, state, j.jobName from emp e left join job j on e.jobid = j.jobId where empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into emp (empid, empname, idcard, sex, email, loc, phone, hiredate, sal, leavedate, jobId, state) values (#{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into emp
empid,
empname,
idcard,
sex,
email,
loc,
phone,
hiredate,
sal,
leavedate,
jobId,
state,

mapper.update:
update emp
empname = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loc = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal = #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobId = #{jobid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update emp set empname = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loc = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sal = #{sal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobId = #{jobid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
